scripts.libparsec:copy-lib: mkdir -p build/src/libparsec || md build\src\libparsec && cp ../../bindings/electron/dist/libparsec/index.node build/src/libparsec || copy /Y ..\..\bindings\electron\dist\libparsec\index.node build\src\libparsec
scripts.libparsec:copy-typing: mkdir -p build/generated-ts/src || md build\generated-ts\src && cp ../../bindings/electron/dist/libparsec/index.d.ts build/generated-ts/src/libparsec.d.ts || copy /Y ..\..\bindings\electron\dist\libparsec\index.d.ts build\generated-ts\src\libparsec.d.ts
scripts.libparsec:copy: npm run libparsec:copy-lib && npm run libparsec:copy-typing
scripts.libparsec:dev: npm run libparsec:build -- dev && npm run libparsec:copy
scripts.libparsec:release: npm run libparsec:build -- release && npm run libparsec:copy
scripts.libparsec:release:sodium: npm run libparsec:build -- release-sodium && npm run libparsec:copy
scripts.electron:release: npm run build:release && electron-builder build --config ./electron-builder.config.json --publish never
scripts.electron:release:sodium: npm run build:release:sodium && electron-builder build --config ./electron-builder.config.json --publish never
